param.name: password
param.label: Password for notebook session:
param.help: Enter password or leave blank for no password

param.name: path_to_sing
param.label: Path to singularity container
param.help: Path to the singularity container in the execution host

param.name: use_gpus
param.label: Use GPUs?
param.help: Select Yes to run a CUDA application inside a container

param.name: partition_or_controller
param.label: Run service on partition or controller node?
param.help: Choose to run the service in the controller / login or partition / compute nodes

param.name: partition
param.label: SLURM partition:
param.help: Partition to submit the interactive job to.

param.name: walltime
param.label: Walltime
param.help: e.g. 01:00:00 - Amount of time slurm will honor the interactive session.

param.name: custom_directives
param.label: Additional SLURM directives
param.help: e.g. ;--mem=1000;--gpus-per-node=1 - Use the semicolon character ; before each parameter. Use no spaces.
